subject: Football
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The owner of a Texas-based scouting service told Yahoo Sports that Oregon Coach Chip Kelly approved a $25,000 payment to him that is the focus of an N.C.A.A. investigation.
snippet: The owner of a Texas-based scouting service told Yahoo Sports that Oregon Coach Chip Kelly approved a $25,000 payment to him that is the focus of an N.C.A.A. investigation.
